a.title: Learning Resources
Information about Coronavirus
Learning Resources
Educator Resources

nav.div: Contra Costa County Office of Education » News » Spotlight » Information about Coronavirus » Learning Resources

div.div:
The Contra Costa County Office of Education (CCCOE) has been working diligently to provide parents and educators with resources for students of all ages to ensure continued student engagement during this time of social distancing.
Our Curriculum and Instruction staff have created a one-stop resource with links to on-line learning sites, compiled by grade and subject, for your convenience.
Please check out this resource here.
Spanish version can be found here: Rescursos para aprender en casa
Editable daily schedules available here: English Version (Microsoft Word Format)
Horarios diarios editables disponibles aquí: Spanish Version
